title: The Journey of Shri Dinesh Sawai, Our Founder
content:
Every great change begins with a dream, and for Shri Dinesh Sawai, that dream was to see even the poorest child holding a book instead of burdens. Born with a deep sense of responsibility towards society, he believed that true transformation could only come through education for the underprivileged.

When he started his journey, he did not have wealth, resources, or support. What he had was an unshakable belief—that no child should be denied education because of poverty. With this conviction, he laid the foundation of Chetana Education Society, a movement of hope for countless families.

The path was never easy. At every step, he faced financial struggles, criticism, and obstacles that could have broken anyone's spirit. But Shri Dinesh Sawai refused to give up. He worked day and night, sometimes sacrificing his own comforts, to keep the flame of education alive. His strength came from the smiles of children who entered the classroom for the first time, their eyes shining with dreams.

Through his perseverance, schools and colleges began to grow, reaching the corners of society where education was once only a distant dream. For many, he was not just an educationist, but a messiah of learning, who gave wings to their aspirations.

Today, as the institutions of Chetana Education Society continue to flourish, they carry forward the legacy of a man who proved that one determined soul can change the destiny of thousands. Shri Dinesh Sawai's life reminds us that education is not just about books and classrooms—it is about dignity, equality, and hope for a better tomorrow.
whoWeAre:
Chetana Education Society was founded with a simple yet powerful vision – to bring the light of education to every child, especially the poorest and most underprivileged in society. Guided by the belief that education is the true path to social change, the Society has grown into a trusted name in the field of learning.

From its humble beginnings, Chetana Education Society has established schools and colleges that provide not just academic knowledge, but also values, confidence, and life skills. Our institutions are built on the dream of our founder, Shri Dinesh Sawai, who dedicated his life to ensuring that no child is left behind because of poverty or circumstances.

Over the years, we have created a nurturing environment where young minds are encouraged to dream big, work hard, and rise above challenges. We are more than just an education society—we are a family of educators, learners, and visionaries, committed to empowering students to become responsible citizens and leaders of tomorrow.

At Chetana, we believe that every child has potential, and through our schools and colleges, we strive to unlock that potential and give them the wings to soar.
